title: Welcome
description: Krystal Ashworth, L.Ac. offers safe, effective acupuncture treatment at Abilene Acupuncture Clinic in Abilene, TX. - Welcome
cleaned_text: Better Health Starts Here! Having evolved over thousands of years, acupuncture is one of the oldest continually practiced medical modalities in the world. A treatment involves the insertion and manipulation of flexible, hair-thin needles at specific points along the body's meridian pathways, which are channels through which the body's energy is thought to flow. Acupuncture is a safe, effective, chemical-free way to promote the body's remarkable self-healing abilities. It is used to prevent and treat disease, relieve pain, balance mood, enhance athletic performance, increase fertility, and improve overall health and wellness. Abilene Acupuncture Clinic 162 Caddo Drive, Suite
